knimeNode.name: Conformal Prediction Loop End
knimeNode.shortDescription: Aggregates the results of conformal prediction for conformal classification or conformal regression.

fullDescription.intro: Aggregates the results of conformal prediction for conformal classification or conformal regression.

ports.inPort: Scored prediction table based on test table. This table is built using the calibration table and aggregated over all iterations using median P-values
